mapper.select: select port_name from port order by port_name desc

select (select b.ship_name from ship b where b.no=t.ship_no) ship_name , (select p.port_name from port p where t.port_no1= p.no ) port_name1 , (select p.port_name from port p where t.port_no2= p.no ) port_name2 , to_char(t.timetable_dtime, 'hh24:mi') TIMETABLE_DTIME, to_char(t.timetable_ltime, 'hh24:mi') TIMETABLE_LTIME , s.seat_grade SEAT_GRADE, s.seat_person SEAT_PERSON,s.seat_student SEAT_STUDENT, s.seat_grand SEAT_GRAND, s.seat_child SEAT_CHILD from timetable t , seatinfo s where s.ship_no= t.ship_no and t.timetable_date = to_date( #{timetable_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.port_no2= #{port_no2}
select distinct p.port_name, p.no from port p , timetable t where t.port_no2= p.no
